GR13sivmstpu:0: mahimnaḥ pāraṃ te paramaviduṣo yady asadṛśī
GR13sivmstpu:1: stutir brahmādīnām api tadavasannās tvayi giraḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:3: mamāpy eṣa stotre hara nirapavādaḥ parikaraḥ // Smst_1
GR13sivmstpu:4: atītaḥ panthānaṃ tava ca mahimā vāṅmanasayor
GR13sivmstpu:5: atadvyāvṛttyā yaṃ cakitam abhidhatte śrutir api /
GR13sivmstpu:6: sa kasya stotavyaḥ katividhaguṇaḥ kasya viṣayaḥ
GR13sivmstpu:7: pade tv arvācīne patati na manaḥ kasya na vacaḥ // Smst_2
GR13sivmstpu:9: tava brahman kiṃ vāg api suraguror vismayapadam /
GR13sivmstpu:10: mama tv etāṃ vāṇīṃ guṇakathanapuṇyena bhavataḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:11: punāmīty arthe 'smin puramathana buddhir vyavasitā // Smst_3
GR13sivmstpu:15: vihantuṃ vyākrośīṃ vidadhata ihaike jaḍadhiyaḥ // Smst_4
GR13sivmstpu:16: kimīhaḥ kiṃkāyaḥ sa khalu kimupāyas tribhuvanaṃ
GR13sivmstpu:17: kimādhāro dhātā sṛjati kimupādāna iti ca /
GR13sivmstpu:19: kutarko 'yaṃ kāṃścin mukharayati mohāya jagataḥ // Smst_5
GR13sivmstpu:22: anīśo vā kuryād bhuvanajanane kaḥ parikaro
GR13sivmstpu:23: yato mandās tvāṃ praty amaravara saṃśerata ime // Smst_6
GR13sivmstpu:24: trayī sāṃkhyaṃ yogaḥ paśupatimataṃ vaiṣṇavam iti
GR13sivmstpu:25: prabhinne prasthāne param idam adaḥ pathyam iti ca /
GR13sivmstpu:27: nṛṇām eko gamyas tvam asi payasām arṇava iva // Smst_7
GR13sivmstpu:28: mahokṣaḥ khaṭvāṅgaṃ paraśur ajinaṃ bhasma phaṇinaḥ
GR13sivmstpu:30: surās tāṃ tām ṛddhiṃ dadhati tu bhavadbhrūpraṇihitāṃ
GR13sivmstpu:31: na hi svātmārāmaṃ viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇā bhramayati // Smst_8
GR13sivmstpu:32: dhruvaṃ kaścit sarvaṃ sakalam aparas tv adhruvam idaṃ
GR13sivmstpu:34: samaste 'py etasmin puramathana tair vismita iva
GR13sivmstpu:35: stuvañ jihremi tvāṃ na khalu nanu dhṛṣṭā mukharatā // Smst_9
GR13sivmstpu:36: tavaiśvaryaṃ yatnād yad upari viriñco harir adhaḥ
GR13sivmstpu:39: svayaṃ tasthe tābhyāṃ tava kim anuvṛttir na phalati // Smst_10
GR13sivmstpu:43: sthirāyās tvadbhaktes tripurahara visphūrjitam idam // Smst_11
GR13sivmstpu:47: pratiṣṭhā tvayy āsīd dhruvam upacito muhyati khalaḥ // Smst_12
GR13sivmstpu:48: yadṛddhiṃ sutrāmṇo varada paramoccair api satīm
GR13sivmstpu:50: na tac citraṃ tasmin varivasitari tvaccaraṇayor
GR13sivmstpu:51: na kasyā unnatyai bhavati śirasas tvayy avanatiḥ // Smst_13
GR13sivmstpu:54: na kalmāṣaḥ kaṇṭhe tava na kurute na śriyam aho
GR13sivmstpu:57: nivartante nityaṃ jagati jayino yasya viśikhāḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:58: sa paśyan īśa tvām itarasurasādhāraṇam abhūt
GR13sivmstpu:59: smaraḥ smartavyātmā na hi vaśiṣu pathyaḥ paribhavaḥ // Smst_15
GR13sivmstpu:63: jagadrakṣāyai tvaṃ naṭasi nanu vāmaiva vibhutā // Smst_16
GR13sivmstpu:65: pravāho vārāṃ yaḥ pṛṣ.atalaghudṛṣṭaḥ śirasi te /
GR13sivmstpu:66: jagad dvīpākāraṃ jaladhivalayaṃ tena kṛtam ity
GR13sivmstpu:67: anenaivonneyaṃ dhṛtamahima divyaṃ tava vapuḥ // Smst_17
GR13sivmstpu:68: rathaḥ kṣoṇī yantā śatadhṛtir agendro dhanur atho
GR13sivmstpu:71: vidheyaiḥ krīḍantyo na khalu paratantrāḥ prabhudhiyaḥ // Smst_18
GR13sivmstpu:72: haris te sāhasraṃ kamalabalim ādhāya padayor
GR13sivmstpu:73: yad ekone tasmin nijam udaharan netrakamalam /
GR13sivmstpu:75: trayāṇāṃ rakṣāyai tripurahara jāgarti jagatām // Smst_19
GR13sivmstpu:76: kratau supte jāgrat tvam asi phalayoge kratumatāṃ
GR13sivmstpu:77: kva karma pradhvastaṃ palati puruṣārādhanam ṛte /
GR13sivmstpu:79: śrutau śraddhāṃ baddhvā dṛḍhaparikaraḥ karmasu janaḥ // Smst_20
GR13sivmstpu:83: dhruvaṃ kartuḥ śraddhāvidhuram abhicārāya hi makhāḥ // Smst_21
GR13sivmstpu:86: dhanuṣpāṇer yātaṃ divam api sapatrākṛtam amuṃ
GR13sivmstpu:87: trasantaṃ te 'dyāpi tyajati na mṛgavyādharabhasaḥ // Smst_22
GR13sivmstpu:89: puraḥ pluṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā puramathana puṣpāyudham api /
GR13sivmstpu:91: avaiti tvām addhā bata varada mugdhā yuvatayaḥ // Smst_23
GR13sivmstpu:94: amāṅgalyaṃ śīlaṃ tava bhavatu nāmaivam akhilaṃ
GR13sivmstpu:95: tathāpi smart.Rṇāṃ varada paramaṃ maṅgalam asi // Smst_24
GR13sivmstpu:99: dadhaty antas tattvaṃ kim api yaminas tat kila bhavān // Smst_25
GR13sivmstpu:100: tvam arkas tvaṃ somas tvam asi pavanas tvaṃ hutavahas
GR13sivmstpu:101: tvam āpas tvaṃ vyoma tvam u dharaṇir ātmā tvam iti ca /
GR13sivmstpu:102: paricchinnām evaṃ tvayi pariṇatā bibhrati giraṃ
GR13sivmstpu:103: na vidmas tat tattvaṃ vayam iha tu yat tvaṃ na bhavasi // Smst_26
GR13sivmstpu:104: trayīṃ tisro vṛttīs tribhuvanam atho trīn api surān
GR13sivmstpu:106: turīyaṃ te dhāma dhvanibhir avarundhānam aṇubhiḥ
GR13sivmstpu:107: samastaṃ vyastaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇada gṛṇātīm iti padam // Smst_27
GR13sivmstpu:108: bhavaḥ śarvo rudraḥ paśupatir athograḥ sahamahāṃs
GR13sivmstpu:109: tathā bhīmeśānāv iti yad abhidhānāṣṭakam idam /
GR13sivmstpu:110: amuṣmin pratyekaṃ pravicarati deva śrutir api
GR13sivmstpu:112: namo nediṣṭhāya priyadava daviṣṭhāya ca namo
GR13sivmstpu:113: namaḥ kṣodiṣṭhāya smarahara mahiṣṭhāya ca namaḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:114: namo varṣiṣṭhāya trinayana yaviṣṭhāya ca namo
GR13sivmstpu:115: namaḥ sarvasmai te tad idam iti sarvāya ca namaḥ // Smst_29
GR13sivmstpu:119: pramahasi pade nistraiguṇye śivāya namo namaḥ // Smst_30
GR13sivmstpu:122: iti cakitam anandīkṛtya māṃ bhaktir ādhād
GR13sivmstpu:130: tad api tava guṇānām īśa pāraṃ na yāti // Smst_Add_1
GR13sivmstpu:134: ruciram alaghuvṛttaiḥ stotram etac cakāra // Smst_Add_2
GR13sivmstpu:139: maheśān nāparo devo mahimno nāparā stutiḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:140: aghorān nāparo mantro nāsti tattvaṃ guroḥ param // Smst_Add_4
GR13sivmstpu:141: dīkṣā dānaṃ tapas tīrthaṃ jñānaṃ yāgādikāḥ kriyāḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:142: mahimnas tava pāṭhasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // Smst_Add_5
GR13sivmstpu:147: sa khalu nijamahimno bhraṣṭa evāsya roṣāt
GR13sivmstpu:148: stavanam idam akārṣīd divyadivyaṃ mahimnaḥ // Smst_Add_7
GR13sivmstpu:154: kaṇṭhasthitena paṭhitena gṛhasthitena samprīṇito bhavati bhūtapatir maheśaḥ // Smst_Add_9
GR13sivmstpu:156: munīnāṃ dārāṇāṃ samajani sa ko 'py avyatikaraḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:157: yato bhagne guhye sakṛd api saparyāṃ vidadhatāṃ
GR13sivmstpu:158: dhruvaṃ mokṣaṃ līlāṃ kim api puruṣārthaṃ prasavite // Smst_Add_10
GR13sivmstpu:160: purāre naivāhaṃ kvacid api bhavantaṃ praṇatavān /
GR13sivmstpu:161: naman muktaḥ sampraty atanur aham agre 'py anatimān
GR13sivmstpu:162: maheśa kṣantavyaṃ tad idam aparādhadvayam api // Smst_Add_11
GR13sivmstpu:164: arpitā tena deveśaḥ prīyatāṃ me sadāśivaḥ // Smst_Add_12
GR13sivmstpu:165: tava tattvaṃ na jānāmi kīdṛśo 'si maheśvara /
GR13sivmstpu:166: yādṛśo 'si mahādeva tādṛśāya namo namaḥ // Smst_Add_13
GR13sivmstpu:167: ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ /
GR13sivmstpu:169: kīrtanena hi rudrasya pāpaṃ yāti sahasradhā /
